imports
```{r}
library(malecns)
library(coconatfly)
library(fafbseg)
library(neuprintr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(stringr)
library(igraph)
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(jsonlite)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(Matrix)
library(neuronbridger)
```

get vAB3 MANC ID

```{r}
mba<-mcns_body_annotations()
vAB.MANC.id <- mba %>%
  filter(grepl('vAB3',synonyms))%>%
  pull(manc_bodyid)%>%
  as.character()

PPN1.MANC.id <- mba %>%
  filter(grepl('PPN1',synonyms))%>%
  pull(manc_bodyid)%>%
  as.character()

```

start neuro bridge

```{r}
all.nb.ids = neuronbridge_ids()

```
